actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance.

summary.text: Increases the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance from 50 percent for 1974 pay periods to 60 percent, and from 60 percent for 1975 pay periods to 75 percent. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 890 (b))

titles.title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' health benefits insurance.
